scene_description_enriched: A group of men, all with golden halos, are depicted looking upwards with hands clasped in prayer. They are dressed in richly colored robes, predominantly gold, blue, and red, with intricate gold detailing. The background is a radiant gold, suggesting a divine or heavenly setting, with a pattern of small gold motifs resembling stylized flames or rays emanating from above. The figures appear to be witnessing or participating in a spiritual event.
